mapper.select: SELECT no,contentid,contenttype,title,address,image1,hit FROM seoultravel WHERE contenttype=#{contenttype} ORDER BY no ASC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY
SELECT s.no,s.title,s.image1,s.address,s.x,s.y, a.infocenter,a.restdate,a.usetime,a.parking,a.msg FROM seoultravel s JOIN attraction a ON s.contentid = a.contentid AND s.contentid=#{contentid}
SELECT no,contentid,contenttype,title,address,image1,hit FROM seoultravel WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' ORDER BY no ASC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM seoultravel WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%'
SELECT no,contentid,title,address,image1,hit,rownum FROM (SELECT no,contentid,title,address,image1,hit FROM seoultravel ORDER BY hit DESC) WHERE rownum<=5
